title: Some palettes for the IDEM, IDDU, and ACEFA research groups
text: function idpalette takes arguments: p, palette, .e., "idem", "iddu", "acefa", n, number colours needed. can also accessed alias functions palette: idem(n), iddu(n), acefa(n) n specified, default number colours true base palette, .e., 7 IDEM, 5 IDDU ACEFA. Usage per calls palettes based colours group logos. also “official” versions palettes, contain four colours specifically selected use graphic design team.

title: Some palettes for the IDEM, IDDU, and ACEFA research groups
text: Works terra plotting:  Sometimes ggplot2 won’t play nicely fed vector values continuous scales, scale_id_continuous allows idpalette arbitrary vector colours used:
code: library(ggplot2)  ggplot(   faithfuld,    aes(waiting, eruptions) ) +  geom_raster(    aes(fill = density)  ) +   scale_fill_gradientn(     colours = idpalette("iddu", 100)   ) ggplot(mpg) +   geom_bar(     aes(       x = trans,       fill = class     )   ) +   scale_fill_manual(values = idpalette("idem")) +   theme_bw() library(sdmtools) library(terra) #> terra 1.7.78 r <- example_raster(seed = 20240802)  par(mfcol = c(1, 2))  plot(   r,   col = idem(100) )  plot(   r,   col = idem(100, rev = TRUE) ) library(ggplot2)  ggplot(mtcars) +  geom_point(    aes(      x = disp,      y = hp,      colour = qsec    ),    size = 5  ) +  scale_id_continuous(    cols = iddu(),    aesthetics = "colour"  )

title: Base colour palettes for IDEM, IDDU, and ACEFA — idpal
